DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess effectiveness Relaxation Response Intervention Depression offer low income population Massachusetts General Hospital ( MGH ) - Chelsea , Revere Charlestown health center .
DOC.brief_title: Retrospective Medical Record Review Mind Body Depression Group Participants
DOC.detailed_description: This retrospective review medical record . The study aim evaluate effect participation Relaxation Response Intervention Depression Clinical group , patient measure : 1 ) depression , anxiety perceive stress ; 2 ) work productivity activity impairment ; 3 ) demand , adherence behavioral medicine ; 4 ) medication use depression and/or anxiety ; 5 ) dose-response effect .
DOC.criteria: Patients receive care MGHHealth Centers diagnosis depression and/or anxiety 21 year age old
